description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. You're going to die. A lot. I mean it. You'll probably even tear out all your hair and/or smash every Xbox controller you own playing this game.  So for your own mental well being, I recommend you don't play it. After all, you just aren't good enough...  Also includes Avatar Dash for FREE.
